title: Ex-PM, Nobel Winner, Student Leader: Key Faces In New Bangladesh Government
content: Bangladesh Protest: A new "interim government" - to be advised, most likely, by Nobel laureate Muhammad Yunus - is taking shape in crisis-hit Bangladesh following Sheikh Hasina resigning as Prime Minister.
summary: Bangladesh Protest: A new "interim government" - to be advised, most likely, by Nobel laureate Muhammad Yunus - is taking shape in crisis-hit Bangladesh following Sheikh Hasina resigning as Prime Minister.

title: CrowdStrike Sued By Fliers After Massive Outage Disrupts Air Travel
content: CrowdStrike's legal troubles from last month's massive global computer outage deepened on Monday, as the cybersecurity company was sued by air travellers whose flights were delayed or cancelled.
summary: CrowdStrike's legal troubles from last month's massive global computer outage deepened on Monday, as the cybersecurity company was sued by air travellers whose flights were delayed or cancelled.

title: OpenAI Co-Founder John Schulman Exits ChatGPT, Joins Rival Anthropic
content: John Schulman, one of the co-founders of artificial intelligence company OpenAI, has left the ChatGPT maker for rival Anthropic, he said in a post on social media platform X late Monday.
summary: John Schulman, one of the co-founders of artificial intelligence company OpenAI, has left the ChatGPT maker for rival Anthropic, he said in a post on social media platform X late Monday.

title: Swiss Firm Launches AI-Powered Hearing Aid, World's First Such Product
content: Switzerland's Sonova on Tuesday introduced a hearing aid that utilises real-time artificial intelligence to improve speech clarity from background noise, the first such product in the global market.
summary: Switzerland's Sonova on Tuesday introduced a hearing aid that utilises real-time artificial intelligence to improve speech clarity from background noise, the first such product in the global market.

title: How Hamas Chief's Assassination Could Disrupt Middle East
content: Israel's assassination of Hamas' political leader will have far-reaching consequences for any chance in peace in the Middle East
summary: Israel's assassination of Hamas' political leader will have far-reaching consequences for any chance in peace in the Middle East

title: What Went Down At Sheikh Hasina's Home Before She Fled Bangladesh
content: Sheikh Hasina did not want to resign as Bangladesh Prime Minister and wanted security forces to intensify the crackdown on nationwide protests, but security bosses said the protests cannot be contained by force, according to a report in Prothom Alo
summary: Sheikh Hasina did not want to resign as Bangladesh Prime Minister and wanted security forces to intensify the crackdown on nationwide protests, but security bosses said the protests cannot be contained by force, according to a report in Prothom Alo

title: Conspiracy Angle In Sheikh Hasina's Ouster? What Government Sources Said
content: There could be a conspiracy angle in former Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's ouster, the government said at today's all-party meeting on the ongoing political crisis in the neighbouring state, sources have said.
summary: There could be a conspiracy angle in former Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's ouster, the government said at today's all-party meeting on the ongoing political crisis in the neighbouring state, sources have said.

title: Over 100 Killed In Violence Across Bangladesh After Sheikh Hasina's Ouster
content: Over 100 people have been killed in the violence across Bangladesh as chaos reined supreme hours after Sheikh Hasina resigned as prime minister and fled the country on Monday, reports said today.
summary: Over 100 people have been killed in the violence across Bangladesh as chaos reined supreme hours after Sheikh Hasina resigned as prime minister and fled the country on Monday, reports said today.

title: Months Ago, Sheikh Hasina Had Claimed She Got An "Offer" From "White Man"
content: Months before her tragic fall as the Prime Minister of Bangladesh, Sheikh Hasina had claimed that "conspiracies" were being hatched to topple her government.
summary: Months before her tragic fall as the Prime Minister of Bangladesh, Sheikh Hasina had claimed that "conspiracies" were being hatched to topple her government.

title: Elon Musk's Transgender Daughter Says He "Just Won't Stop Lying" About Her
content: Vivian said that when she was six years old, Mr Musk referred to Arabic as the "language of the enemy" and that he is not the champion of equality that he loves to pretend to be.

title: Centre Not To Relax $4 Billion Tax Demand To Infosys: Report
content: The central government is not considering any relaxation over the 320 billion rupees ($4 billion) tax demand it sent to Infosys, according to a government source.
summary: The central government is not considering any relaxation over the 320 billion rupees ($4 billion) tax demand it sent to Infosys, according to a government source.

title: Who Is Nahid Islam, Student Leader Who Led Protests Against Sheikh Hasina
content: After nearly a month of anti-quota and anti-government demonstrations that swept across Bangladesh, Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled the country.
summary: After nearly a month of anti-quota and anti-government demonstrations that swept across Bangladesh, Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled the country.

title: Trump Supporter Who Rioted At US Capitol To Get His Spear, Headdress Back
content: Jacob Chansley, 36, known as the "QAnon Shaman," became one of the faces of the January 6, 2021 assault on the Capitol because of his red, white and blue face paint, bare chest and unusual headgear.
summary: Jacob Chansley, 36, known as the "QAnon Shaman," became one of the faces of the January 6, 2021 assault on the Capitol because of his red, white and blue face paint, bare chest and unusual headgear.

title: Rahul Gandhi's Pak Question At Meeting On Bangladesh, S Jaishankar's Reply
content: Leader of the Opposition Rahul Gandhi fielded two key questions to External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar during the all-party meeting on the situation in Bangladesh after Sheikh Hasina's ouster as Prime Minister amid violent protests.
summary: Leader of the Opposition Rahul Gandhi fielded two key questions to External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar during the all-party meeting on the situation in Bangladesh after Sheikh Hasina's ouster as Prime Minister amid violent protests.

title: US Court Details How Google Built Illegal Search Monopoly
content: U.S. District Judge Amit Mehta on Monday ruled that Google had violated antitrust law by spending billions of dollars to secure exclusive agreements with developers, carriers and equipment makers to be the default search engine.
summary: U.S. District Judge Amit Mehta on Monday ruled that Google had violated antitrust law by spending billions of dollars to secure exclusive agreements with developers, carriers and equipment makers to be the default search engine.

title: Who Is Khaleda Zia, Jailed Bangla Ex-PM Set To Be Released Amid Turmoil
content: The fall of the Sheikh Hasina government in Bangladesh points to a big change in the country's political landscape - led by possibilities that the Awami League leader's arch-rival Khaleda Zia may again aim for power.
summary: The fall of the Sheikh Hasina government in Bangladesh points to a big change in the country's political landscape - led by possibilities that the Awami League leader's arch-rival Khaleda Zia may again aim for power.

title: Who Is Muhammad Yunus, Possible Advisor Of Interim Bangladesh Government
content: Hours after Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled the country, the coordinators of the Anti-Discrimination Student Movement proposed an interim government headed by Nobel Laureate Dr Muhammad Yunus.
summary: Hours after Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled the country, the coordinators of the Anti-Discrimination Student Movement proposed an interim government headed by Nobel Laureate Dr Muhammad Yunus.

title: Passengers Struggle To Breathe After AC Malfunctions On Thai Airways Plane
content: We were hot and couldn't breathe. At least in a sauna, you can leave when you want," said a passenger on the flight.

title: Controversial YouTuber Gifts Donald Trump A Tesla Cybertruck, Musk Reacts
